recipe.title: Banana Mint Chocolate Chip Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup ; fresh mint, packed ; (15 g)
1 oz ; dark baker's chocolate, roughly chopped ; (30 g)
1 cup ; soy milk, or other milk substitute ; (235 mL)

steps.step: Add tofu and maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk together until smooth and no large lumps are present.
Transfer tofu mixture to ice tray and using a rubber spatula to evenly spread the mixture into each of the cube slots.
Place bananas, mint, chocolate, 4 tofu cubes, cocoa powder, and milk in a blender, making sure that the cubs sit on top of the other ingredients.
